_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.15^where_before_or: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.15^who_mentioned_b: monks who stored one of their three robes in inhabited areas
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:1.2.15^who_present_bef: monks who had completed the rainy-season residence
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.29^who_mentioned_bef: a monk staying in a wilderness dwelling
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
